name: Pongame War
description:
In honor of the D.I.E. Dedicated to N.V. . Purely inspired by I Am (from Tom Shaydac, on Netflix) and all the reflections after midnight about death. . . observation notes: . 1) if none of the controls work, click the mouse on the game square and try again.

.

2) the "objective" of the levels is to equalize the scores of both players, according to the level. if you are at level one, the score must be one by one, so that you can advance in the level by clicking space. and so on

.

3) this game is not an appeal to any mediocre behavior, it is a philosophical symbology. the equal score means that no one can win in this situation. everyone always loses. play and you will understand . Controls: Directionals, S and W – navigate, move character R – reset “ball” state Space – Confirm
